Title: Claude's checkout has this incredible UX I've never seen: when you go to the payment page it just se...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: Claude's checkout has this incredible UX I've never seen: when you go to the payment page it just sends you a 2FA text. I've never received a 2FA text without some indication that I was about to. Also their address selector breaks chrome autofill @alexalbert__ please fix
